body_html: This issue persists when you change the name of the run folder. It seems that the checkpoints/checkpoint file only keep the old path and tf fails when latest_checkpoint is used over this new folder.
body_text: This issue persists when you change the name of the run folder. It seems that the checkpoints/checkpoint file only keep the old path and tf fails when latest_checkpoint is used over this new folder.
body: This issue persists when you change the name of the run folder. It seems that the checkpoints/checkpoint file only keep the old path and tf fails when latest_checkpoint is used over this new folder.
